Name: Fishards
About the game: Combine The Five Elements In the game you play as a fish wizard that has the ability to combine elements into different spells: Intense, Wacky, Skill-shot PVP! Learn which elements combine into what spell, how to switch between spells quickly and become a dominating force! Gorgeous Graphics Fishards looks like a 2D game, however, itâ€™s really just 3D models rendered in low resolution and scaled up!
